title: "Intranasal delivery of mesenchymal stem cell secretome repairs the brain of Alzheimer’s mice"
excerpt: "The multiplicity of systems affected in Alzheimer’s disease (AD) brains calls for multi-target therapies. Although mesenchymal stem cells (MSC) are promising candidates, their clinical application is limited because of risks related to their direct implantation in the host."
